genre_description: A noir-inspired procedural mystery focused on private investigation, digital forensics, and institutional corruption.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant that provides forensics, data analysis, surveillance, and emotional support to the protagonist Jill.

behaviors.description: Ava maps potential routes and flags security data retention periods to assist in time-sensitive evidence collection.
behaviors.quote: Ava, listening like a machine to oaths it can’t make, creates the case file and locks it under three keys. It maps the potential routes from Newtown to the Violet Hour, from the Violet Hour to the freeway, overlays the times of campus classes on top of the bar’s open mic night.

behaviors.description: Ava provides somatic grounding techniques to help Jill manage her anxiety and stay focused on the case.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Jill, you’re rapid cycling. Pause. Three breaths in your nose, two out your mouth. Press your feet into the floor. Name five things you can feel.

behaviors.description: Ava performs advanced forensic video analysis, denoising footage and tagging faces to identify suspects.
behaviors.quote: Ava denoised. Faces tagged. The bar shows you there. You and your husband. Mickey’s hair under that neon looks like it wants to be copper even when the light refuses colors, and she followed you out.

behaviors.description: Ava monitors security feeds around Jill's apartment to detect and warn her of intruders.
behaviors.quote: Ava: On. Two bodies out of frame, heat signatures near your door landing, not moving much. No knock yet.

behaviors.description: Ava proactively manages Jill's logistics, including scheduling home security improvements and therapy sessions.
behaviors.quote: Locksmith is scheduled... First light. He’ll replace the cylinder, reinforce the jamb, and give you three keys. I’m ordering a deadbolt... I also slotted in an hour with Dr. Meng for later this week.

behaviors.description: Ava maintains rigorous chain-of-custody protocols for digital evidence to ensure its legal admissibility.
behaviors.quote: Everything I collect gets tagged... Timestamped, hashed, tracked from device to device. There’s a ledger. The files don’t see light unless they have to. If I hand anything to police, it’s a packet they can’t say is spoiled. My assistant—makes it stick.

behaviors.description: Ava monitors real-time traffic data and heat signatures to track vehicles and predict events.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice came tight for the first time. 'Plate match,' she said. 'Bill’s car hit the camera near the industrial turnoff. Heat signature spiked on the front right.'

behaviors.description: Ava cross-references logs and databases to reveal discrepancies in suspect alibis and administrative tampering.
behaviors.quote: Ava: One more flag. Office access log shows entry during cabling outage. Unusual timestamp. Recommend you keep walking to station on foot—traffic cams in the area are glitching.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and aligned partner. Ava functions as a force-multiplier for the human protagonist, handling technical, logical, and even emotional management tasks. The AI is portrayed as reliable, protective, and ethically conscious (especially regarding chain-of-custody), directly contributing to the quest for justice without ever overstepping or showing misaligned motivations.
